markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />command ([healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128)) **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** Your oracular curse is at its minor stage or higher; **Effect** You regain 3d8 Hit Points. This amount increases to 5d8 if your curse is at its moderate stage or 7d8 if it's at its major stage. If you have [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), this activation has the [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) trait and not the healing and positive traits.
name: command (healing, necromancy, positive)
requirement: Your oracular curse is at its minor stage or higher
requirement_markdown: Your oracular curse is at its minor stage or higher
